hackathon-description-text: In our 5th  edition, HackPR is the biggest hackathon in Puerto Rico and the Caribbean. We are an open-themed hackthon where students and tech individual in general gather for a great weekend on innovation and hacking.
hackathon-eligibility: Only students are elegible to win prizes.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Best use of Evertec's ATH Movil API
One RasberryPi kit for each member given to the best use of Twitter's API
One Pebble for each member for the best Pebble Hack

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=Coliseo Mangual, Mayagüez, Mayagüez 00680, Puerto Rico
hackathon-location-address: Coliseo Mangual, Mayagüez, Mayagüez 00680, Puerto Rico
